directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine sugar, brown sugar, butter and evaporated milk.  Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, and boil for 7 minutes.  Remove from heat; stir in marshmallow creme until well incorporated and melted.  Stir in peanut butter and vanilla until smooth; spread in prepared pan.  Let cool before cutting into squares.
title: Creamy Peanut Butter Fudge
